Don Kidd

Welcome

               
Welcome to my journey as I document how we have introduced more and more QA practices to a group of developers that hadn't regularly or consistently abided by Quality practices. I will include both the good things and some of the bad. I hope to share conferences I have been too, things I have learned and tools that I have found or developed along my way.
